title: The Voice of Resistance: Noam Chomsky's Journey Against War
description: Join Noam Chomsky, renowned MIT professor and activist, as he recounts his deep involvement in anti-war activities. Discover how Chomsky became a national leader in the American resistance to the Vietnam War and explore the impact of his international reputation. #NoamChomsky #AntiWarActivism #MITProfessor #VietnamWar #SocialJustice #Activism #PoliticalActivist #PeaceMovement #Intellectual #InspiringTalks
